CustomField.formula: IF( ( ISBLANK(terminus_mktg__SpikePercent__c) || terminus_mktg__SpikePercent__c = 0.00 ) , IMAGE("/resource/terminus_mktg__pepper0", "0 peppers", 20, 50), IF( terminus_mktg__SpikePercent__c <= 1.00, IMAGE("/resource/terminus_mktg__pepper1", "1 pepper", 20, 50), IF( terminus_mktg__SpikePercent__c <=2.50, IMAGE("/resource/terminus_mktg__pepper2", "2 peppers", 20, 50), IMAGE("/resource/terminus_mktg__pepper3", "3 peppers", 20, 50))))
CustomField.label: Spike Heat
